english: She expostulated with her husband on his habit of smoking in bed .
chinese: 她劝戒丈夫改掉在床上吸烟的习惯。

english: Admonish your friends in private , praise them in public
chinese: 对朋友私下劝戒，公开表扬。

english: She had abandoned all attempts at remonstrance with thomas
chinese: 她已经放弃了一切劝戒托马斯的尝试。

english: Yet do not regard him as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother
chinese: 15只是不要以他为仇敌，乃要劝戒他如弟兄。

english: 2 thes . 3 : 15 yet do not regard him as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother
chinese: 帖后三15只是不要以他为仇敌，乃要劝戒他如弟兄。
劝戒造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes , but a wise man listens to counsel
chinese: 15愚妄人所行的，在自己眼中看为正直，惟智慧人肯听劝戒。

english: Oil and perfume rejoice the heart ; so a man ' s counsel is sweet to his friend
chinese: 9膏油与香料使人心喜乐；人的劝戒，对他朋友也是如此甘美。

english: " hear , o my people , and i will admonish you ; o israel , if you would listen to me
chinese: 诗81 : 8我的民哪、你当听我要劝戒你。以色列阿、甚愿你肯听从我。

english: It is not to shame you that i write these things but to admonish you as my beloved children
chinese: 14我写这些话，不是羞辱你们，乃像劝戒我亲爱的儿女一样。

english: Give ear , o my people , and i will give you my word , o israel , if you will only do as i say
chinese: 我的民哪，你当听。我要劝戒你。以色列阿，甚愿你肯听从我。

english: So watch yourselves . " if your brother sins , rebuke him , and if he repents , forgive him
chinese: 3你们要谨慎。若是你的弟兄得罪你，就劝戒他。他若懊悔，就饶恕他。

english: These things speak and exhort and reprove with all authority . let no one disregard you
chinese: 多2 : 15这些事你要讲明、劝戒人、用各等权柄责备人。不可叫人轻看你。

english: Like an earring of gold or an ornament of fine gold is a wise man ' s rebuke to a listening ear
chinese: 12智慧人的劝戒、在顺从的人耳中、好像金耳环、和精金的妆饰。

english: Like an earring of gold and an ornament of fine gold is a wise reprover to a listening ear
chinese: 箴25 : 12智慧人的劝戒、在顺从的人耳中、好像金耳环、和精金的妆饰。

english: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go ： i will guide thee with mine eye
chinese: 8我要教导你，指示你当行的路。我要定睛在你身上劝戒你。
